Method Detail

calculateHolidayBonus

public static double[] calculateHolidayBonus(double[][] data,
                                             double high,
                                             double low,
                                             double other)
Calculates the holiday bonus for each store

Parameters:
data - the two dimensional array of store sales
high - bonus for the highest store in a category
low - bonus for the lowest store in a category
other - bonus for all other stores in a category
Returns:
an array of the bonus for each store

calculateTotalHolidayBonus

public static double calculateTotalHolidayBonus(double[][] data,
                                                double high,
                                                double low,
                                                double other)
Calculates the total holiday bonuses

Parameters:
data - the two dimensional array of store sales
high - bonus for the highest store in a category
low - bonus for the lowest store in a category
other - bonus for all other stores in a category
Returns:
the total of all holiday bonuses
